idea-plugin.name: CompareMaster
idea-plugin.description:
Tool window with 2 editors for JSON processing and comparison.
Helps to format, compare, replace, sort and show diff in given JSON files.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Bug Fixes

  • Error when formatting JSON has been fixed (occurred in Windows OS due to line separator)
  • 'Add absent values from left to right' operation has been fixed when working with JSON arrays
